data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
In Belo Horizonte, Guga of Atletico Mineiro is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 2, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
In the minute 4, Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Recife PE awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 10, Junior Alonso gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico Mineiro.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Independencia.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 14, Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro push forward at Independencia and Junior Alonso gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Recife PE defence.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Keno (Atletico Mineiro) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro's Jefferson Savarino breaks free at Independencia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets in a shot on goal at Independencia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Recife PE's Lucas Mugni is whistled for offside at Independencia.
Keno for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 24, Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
Throw-in for Recife PE at Independencia.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 27, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Recife PE needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Recife PE.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Free kick Recife PE.
Goal kick for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior waits before resuming play because Luan Polli for Recife PE is still down.
Recife PE's Luan Polli looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
In the minute 36, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a throw-in for Atletico Mineiro, close to Recife PE's area.
Throw-in Recife PE.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 40, Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In Belo Horizonte, Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Recife PE.
Jefferson Savarino of Atletico Mineiro smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Atletico Mineiro drives forward and Jair gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 43, Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In the minute 44, Atletico Mineiro drive upfield and Rever gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Recife PE defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 45, Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Independencia the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro drive forward through Keno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Atletico Mineiro are coming forward and Keno gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Independencia.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Adryelson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 48, Recife PE’s Adryelson is on his feet again at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Atletico Mineiro's Eduardo Sasha misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro's Keno is caught offside.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro at Independencia.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Recife PE close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Recife PE.
Can Atletico Mineiro get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Recife PE's half?
In the minute 55, Eduardo Sasha (Atletico Mineiro) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
In Belo Horizonte a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
Atletico Mineiro pushes forward through Eduardo Sasha, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 58, Atletico Mineiro's Keno is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico Mineiro in Belo Horizonte.
Eduardo Sasha (Atletico Mineiro) shoots – and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 59, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Atletico Mineiro territory.
Recife PE have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 60, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
Ball safe as Atletico Mineiro is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Recife PE make their first substitution with Junior Tavares replacing Raul Prata.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a second substitution, with Ronaldo replacing Marcio Araujo.
Marrony is on a sub for Eduardo Sasha for Atletico Mineiro.
In the minute 67, Jorge Sampaoli is making the team's second substitution at Independencia with Federico Zaracho replacing Alan Franco.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in Recife PE.
Throw-in for Atletico Mineiro in the half of Recife PE.
Federico Zaracho for Atletico Mineiro drives towards goal at Independencia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 71, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Free kick for Atletico Mineiro in their own half.
In the minute 73, Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
Goal kick for Recife PE at Independencia.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Marquinhos is replacing Thiago Neves for Recife PE at Independencia.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior blows against Atletico Mineiro's Keno for offside.
In the minute 75, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Recife PE throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico Mineiro's half?
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Recife PE in the half of Atletico Mineiro.
Atletico Mineiro awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atletico Mineiro close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Recife PE needs to be cautious. Atletico Mineiro have an attacking throw-in.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 82, Recife PE are in shooting range from this free kick.
Junior Tavares of Recife PE gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Belo Horizonte.
In the minute 85, Atletico Mineiro's Keno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Independencia.
Atletico Mineiro to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
In the minute 86, Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Atletico Mineiro.
Junior Alonso (Atletico Mineiro) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 86, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Independencia.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior signals a Atletico Mineiro throw-in in Recife PE's half.
In the minute 87, Free kick in a good position for Recife PE!
Atletico Mineiro's Keno has been booked in Belo Horizonte and will miss the next match through suspension.
Junior Tavares for Recife PE gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 88, Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Atletico Mineiro a goal kick.
Atletico Mineiro have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In Belo Horizonte Atletico Mineiro attack through Jefferson Savarino. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Belo Horizonte.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Guilherme Arana (Atletico Mineiro) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Recife PE.
Recife PE have been awarded a corner by Paulo Roberto Alves Junior.
In Belo Horizonte Recife PE attack through Patric. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Atletico Mineiro goal kick.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Throw-in Atletico Mineiro.
Paulo Roberto Alves Junior will wait an extra 6 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Can Atletico Mineiro capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Atletico Mineiro's Junior Alonso attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Belo Horizonte. The final score is 0-0.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Ricardinho.
Marcos Serrato (Recife PE) has replaced the possibly injured Ricardinho.
